DOC.brief_summary: Melioidosis in head and neck was observed including clinical presentation, diagnosis with titer, and result of treatment.
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Presentation of Melioidosis in Head and Neck Region
DOC.detailed_description: This research is retrospective study about five years ( Jan 2011- Oct 2016).
DOC.criteria: Patients who has the pus culture from head and neck region positive with Burkholderia pseudomallei
